explanation: 该研究使用机器学习方法预测了云南高原地区典型空气污染物（O3、SO2和PM2.5）的浓度，并探讨了其驱动机制，涉及气象因素、排放数据和地形特征，这与大气环境遥感技术中的空气质量监测和污染物分析密切相关。
authors: Yanqiu He;Yingxiang Jiang;Qiang Cao;Zewei Liu;Jiacheng Han;Wencai Li;Zhihong Chen
title: A study on the prediction and driving mechanisms of typical air pollutant concentrations in the Yunnan Plateau region using machine learning
abstract:
•Multi-model evaluation: RF stability is optimal. •Differences in pollutant predictions: O3has the highest accuracy, PM2.5has the lowest. •Revealing the synergistic pollution mechanism of “emissions-topography-weather” in highlands. 
 This study employs machine learning methods to predict O3, SO2, and PM2.5 concentrations at four typical sites in the Yunnan Plateau region (Diqing, Dali, Pu'er, and Banna) and examines the underlying driving mechanisms. By utilizing four models—RF, BP, CNN, and LSTM—and combining meteorological factors, emission data, and terrain characteristics, the prediction results indicate that all models exhibit high accuracy with narrow performance gaps. Although RF demonstrates slightly superior overall stability, the structurally simpler BP model performs comparably to deep learning models in specific scenarios, indicating that complex architectures are not always strictly superior. O3 prediction performance is optimal (R2 > 0.88) due to its strong photochemical reaction regularity; SO2 follows (R2 = 0.79–0.97), influenced by the stability of emission sources; PM2.5 has the poorest fit (R2 = 0.56–0.86), attributed to its multi-source nonlinear characteristics and the complexity of transboundary transport. Models generally exhibit the characteristic of “low concentration accuracy and high concentration deviation.” The study revealed a multi-factor synergistic mechanism of pollutant formation in plateau regions, highlighting that data sparsity, insufficient feature quantification, and the non-linear modeling capabilities of algorithms are the primary bottlenecks of current models.

explanation: 该论文研究上海臭氧形成的机理，并使用机器学习方法进行预测和分析，涉及空气质量监测和大气成分分析，与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。
authors: Chensu Shen;Yanyu Wang;Yaqin Gao;Changwen Ma;Yali Lei;Qian Wang;Rusha Yan;Yuhang Wu;Hongli Wang
title: The mechanisms of ozone formation in Shanghai based on explainable stacking ensemble machine learning: The role of OVOCs
abstract:
•Stacking EML model with VOCs data improves O3prediction accuracy (R2=0.81). •SHAP analysis reveals that OVOCs dominate O3formation on polluted days (27.1%). •O3sensitivity results confirm a transition toward a weakly VOC-limited regime in Shanghai. 
 In recent years, surface ozone (O3) pollution has become increasingly severe in East China, especially in Shanghai, highlighting the need for accurate models to forecast O3 concentrations and to investigate its formation mechanism. This study develops an O3 forecasting model using a stacking ensemble machine learning (Stacking EML) method based on meteorological and air pollutant data from 2021 to 2024. Subsequently, Shapley Additive exPlanations (SHAP) analysis is employed to quantify the influences of meteorological and chemical factors on O3 formation during a typical O3 pollution episode in Shanghai. The integration of volatile organic compounds (VOCs) significantly enhances the model performance, with the R2 value increasing from 0.74 to 0.81. SHAP analysis reveals that chemical factors dominate O3 formation on polluted days (60%), higher than meteorological factors (40%). Total VOCs (TVOCs) are the primary chemical driver (42%), and oxygenated volatile organic compounds (OVOCs) constitute 27.1%, with reactive aldehydes being the dominant species. O3 formation sensitivity curves from 2021 to 2024 further indicate that Shanghai is in a VOC-limited regime, with a tendency toward a weakly VOC-limited condition. The combination of Stacking EML and SHAP analysis proves to be a powerful tool for predicting and interpreting O3 formation, thereby providing a scientific basis for formulating coordinated NOx and VOCs emission reduction strategies.

explanation: 该研究涉及在森林生态系统中观测臭氧通量，这与大气环境遥感技术中的空气质量监测和大气组成分析密切相关。研究使用梯度法测量臭氧通量，并探讨了森林对臭氧的吸收特性，这些都是大气环境遥感技术的重要研究领域。
authors: R. Wada;T. Miyama;Y. Kominami;S. Takanashi;G. Katata;M. Ueyama;A. Tani;S. Yonemura;K. Takagi;Y. Matsumi;M. Kajino;T. Nakano;Y. Takahashi;M. Watanabe;M. Yamaguchi;Y. Kinose;T. Izuta
title: Long-term observations of ozone fluxes in a Japanese red pine forest
abstract:
•O3fluxes were observed in an Asian forest for five years. •O3fluxes were measured by the gradient method, with CO2fluxes for quality control. •The ratio of O3absorbed by stomata was high, reflecting the properties of the forest. •The cumulative O3absorbed by stomata was small, but its effect cannot be excluded. 
 Quantifying seasonal variations in ozone (O3) fluxes in forest ecosystems and identifying their causes are essential for characterizing the global sink and source strength of O3 and conserving atmospheric and forest environments. We measured O3 fluxes in a Japanese red pine (Pinus densiflora) forest located at the foothills of Mt. Fuji from 2016 to 2020 using the micrometeorological gradient method. Flux quality was validated by comparing CO2 fluxes derived from the gradient and eddy-covariance methods, which showed good agreement. To our knowledge, this study represents the first multiyear observations of O3 fluxes and stomatal O3 uptake ratios in an Asian forest. The measured five-year daytime O3 fluxes (10:00–15:00) in summer and winter were −9.6 ± 3.2 and −3.3 ± 1.8 nmol m−2 s−1, respectively. The O3 flux in winter was approximately 30% of that in summer. The daytime O3 concentration and flux (deposition) values peaked in spring and summer. The ratios of the stomatal O3 uptake to the total forest O3 deposition in summer and winter were 0.64 ± 0.28 and 0.32 ± 0.30, respectively. This ratio was among the highest reported in previous studies. A likely explanation is the relatively low ambient O3 concentration at the observation site. The cumulative value of leaf area-based stomatal O3 fluxes exceeding 1.6 and 1 nmol m−2 s−1 during summer was 0.7 and 1.9 mmol m−2, respectively. The Japanese red pine forests absorb a certain amount of O3, which has the potential to impact the ecosystem. Further studies are needed to quantify ecological impacts and underlying deposition processes.

explanation: 该论文研究了法国长期极端降水事件的气候学，使用了雨量计数据和再分析数据，分析了极端降水指数的时空变化趋势，并探讨了大型气候指数对降水变异的影响。虽然不直接涉及遥感技术，但与大气环境监测和气候变化研究密切相关，属于大气环境遥感技术的研究范畴。
authors: Anthony Dommange;Elham Ghasemifar;Céline Planche;Jean-Luc Baray
title: Climatology of long-term extreme precipitation using rain gauges data over France
abstract:
•Increasing trend in RX1 was observed, while P99th exhibited no significant trend. •RP99th revealed a significant decreasing trend, whereas ME99th showed a significant increase. •Seasonally, RX1, P99th and ME99th peaked in autumn, while RP99th increased from May through December. •Global indices can explain precipitation variability up to 33% in France. 
 This study presents a comprehensive analysis of extreme precipitation events (EPs) across France over the period 1950-2023, using a rigorously quality-controlled dataset of 352 rain gauges that met strict completeness criteria (≥ 99% temporal coverage). Comparison with ERA5 reanalysis data showed systematic overestimation of rainy days (by 10-30 days) and underestimation of peak precipitation in mountainous regions, highlighting the superiority of ground observations for the subsequent analysis and trend detection. We characterized spatial and temporal variability of EPs using multiple indices including annual maximum 1-day precipitation (RX1), 99th percentile threshold (P99th), mean exceedance above the 99th percentile (ME99th), and frequency of extreme rainy days (RP99th), following the definitions set by the Expert Team on Climate Change Detection and Indices (ETCCDI), with particular focus on the Massif Central and Cévennes regions as critical hydrological hotspots. Quality control showed that 95% of stations had no significant outliers, and 86% demonstrated homogenous precipitation data. A statistically significant increasing trend in RX1 was observed (0.5 mm decade-1, P < 0.05), while P99th exhibited no significant trend. RP99th revealed a significant decreasing trend (-1.6 days decade-1, P < 0.05), whereas ME99th showed a significant increase (∼0.26 mm decade-1, P < 0.1). Seasonally, RX1, P99th and ME99th peaked in autumn, while RP99th increased from May through December. Spatially, stations located in the Cévennes and Massif Central recorded the highest values of RX1, P99th, and ME99th, with a noticeable intensification in their trends. The years 1982 and 2003 showed peak anomalies in RX1 and ME99th. Investigation of large-scale atmospheric drivers revealed that six climate indices (El Niño–Southern Oscillation (ENSO), Arctic Oscillation (AO), North Atlantic Oscillation (NAO), East Atlantic Oscillation (EAO), Scandinavian pattern (SCA), East Atlantic–Western Russia (EAWR)) with semiannual and annual cycles of precipitation collectively explain up to 33% of precipitation variability, though their influence was weaker for extreme indices. Nonetheless, correlations between global climate indices and precipitation were statistically significant (P < 0.05), exceeding 0.4 at several stations. Notably, the AO and SCA had distinct negative (r = -0.26) and positive (r = 0.29) effects, respectively. Thirteen widespread extreme precipitation events (P99th) were identified, each affecting at least 15% of stations. Among them, only the event in December 2003 was classified as severely abnormal based on Gumbel return period analysis; others were within the historical range of variability. Synoptic analysis indicated that these events were often driven by low-pressure systems over the North Atlantic, with cyclonic circulation and enhanced westerlies channeling moisture via atmospheric rivers into the region.

explanation: 该论文研究东亚夏季降雨的年际变化及其与季风和热带气旋共同影响的关系，涉及海冰浓度和海表温度异常等大气环境要素，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测、大气成分分析、气溶胶反演）密切相关。
topic_words: ['interannual variability', 'monsoon', 'tropical cyclones', 'sea ice concentration', 'sea surface temperature anomalies']
authors: Fei Zhang;Zhiwei Wu
title: Predictability of interannual variations in East Asian summer rainfall under the combined influence of active monsoon and landfalling tropical cyclones
abstract:
•Monsoon–TC landfall (MS-LTC) rainfall exhibits a WNP–North China double-center pattern and is associated with a meridional dipole circulation. •The Greenland and Barents Seas SIC anomalies and Niño1 + 2 SSTAs serve as key precursors shaping MS-LTC interannual variability. •A physics-based empirical model using SIC and Niño1 + 2 indices provides high skillful seasonal prediction of MS-LTC rainfall. 
 East Asian summer rainfall (EASR) exhibits substantial spatial and temporal diversity. One of its prominent and impactful forms is monsoon–tropical cyclone landfall (MS-LTC) rainfall, which occurs when the East Asian summer monsoon (EASM) coincides with landfalling tropical cyclones (TCs) and typically leads to extreme rainfall and flooding over China. However, the physical mechanisms governing MS-LTC rainfall and its seasonal predictability remain poorly understood. Observations from 1983 to 2023 show that the leading mode of MS-LTC rainfall is dominated by interannual variability, featuring two anomaly centers located over the Western North Pacific (WNP) and North China, and associated with a meridional dipole circulation over East Asia (EA), comprising a low-latitude cyclone and a mid-latitude anticyclone. Two independent and physically meaningful precursors have been identified: Arctic sea ice concentration (SIC) anomalies over the Greenland and Barents Seas, and cold sea surface temperature anomalies (SSTAs) in the far eastern equatorial Pacific (Niño1 + 2 region). The Arctic SIC anomalies can persist from the preceding winter through summer, primarily maintained by the sea ice–albedo feedback and the ocean memory effect over the Greenland and Barents Seas, respectively. Both observations and numerical experiments demonstrate that these anomalies excite a downstream Rossby wave train, facilitating the development of the meridional dipole pattern over EA. Concurrently, La Niña–like SST cooling induces a baroclinic response over EA that exhibits a circulation structure opposite to the Pacific–East Asia (PEA) teleconnection, thereby sustaining the dipole pattern. A physics-based empirical prediction (P-E) model that combines MAM SIC and JFM Niño1 + 2 indices achieves the highest skill in predicting MS-LTC PC1 during the hindcast period. This P-E model provides a physically grounded and operationally feasible tool for the seasonal prediction of MS-LTC rainfall.

explanation: 该论文研究了中国东北冷涡的三维结构季节性差异及其热力学动力学机制，涉及大气组成和结构变化，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测、大气成分分析、气溶胶反演）密切相关。
authors: Xiaotao Zhao;Yiyu Qing;Shunwu Zhou;Mingcheng Chen;Xulin Ma;Wei Liu;Lin Jiang;Liang Hao
title: Significant differences in the three-dimensional scale of the Northeast China Cold Vortex between summer and winter and the associated thermodynamic-dynamic mechanisms
abstract:
•NCCV shows 26.4% horizontal shrinkage and 60% vertical expansion in summer vs winter. •Summer heating generates core PV anomalies, dissipates edge PV, enhances convergence. •Thermodynamic-dynamic coupling drives seasonal rescaling of NCCV 3D structure. 
 The Northeast China Cold Vortex (NCCV) significantly affects regional weather, but its three-dimensional (3D) seasonal structural differences have not been systematically quantified. Using ERA5 reanalysis data (2000−2020), we quantify these contrasts through statistics and dynamical compositing. The results show that: (1) The summer NCCV has a smaller horizontal scale (365 km), approximately 26.4% smaller than the winter mean (496 km). In contrast, its vertical scale is larger (8 km), about 60% greater than in winter (5 km). (2) Thermodynamically, intense summer diabatic heating (primarily latent heat release) generates potential vorticity (PV) anomalies near the vortex core, while the peripheral PV anomalies rapidly dissipate. This enhances convergence and vertical PV transport and leads to a “compact and deep” structure. In contrast, weaker diabatic heating and vertical PV transport in winter result in a “broad and shallow” structure. (3) Dynamically, the vortex core exhibits stronger inertial stability in summer, favoring upward transport of PV. In winter, a broader region of inertial stability inhibits convergence and limits vertical development of the vortex system. This combined thermodynamic-dynamic perspective improves the understanding and prediction of NCCV-related extreme weather.

explanation: 该研究分析了中国2020-2022年夏季台风活动的特征及其与三重拉尼娜事件的关系，涉及了大气环流、海温异常和台风路径等与大气环境相关的因素，因此与大气环境遥感技术有强相关性。
authors: Qing-Bo Zeng;Ying Wang;Rong-Hua Zhang
title: Characteristics of summer typhoon activities over China during 2020–2022 and their relationships with the Triple La Niña events
abstract:
•More coastal-proximate typhoons with shorter warning times occurred in the 2020-2022 triple La Niña period. •In 2020-2022, an intensified WPSH shifted northward and westward, steering genesis northwestward and tracks toward China. •Westward-shifted Walker ascent, warm western Pacific SSTs, and stronger VWS favored genesis but suppressed intensification. 
 During 2020–2022, typhoon activity over the Northwest Pacific was associated with basin-wide tropical climate anomalies linked to the triple La Niña, with genesis regions shifting northwestward and intensities being generally weaker. This study, based on best-track typhoon data and the ERA5 (European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts Reanalysis 5th Generation) data, investigates the main characteristics of summer typhoon activity in China during 2020–2022 and their underlying physical processes. The key findings are as follows: During the La Niña period, the Pacific SSTA (Sea Surface Temperature Anomaly)exhibited an east-cold, west-warm pattern, leading to an expanded Western Pacific Subtropical High (WPSH) with its ridge shifting northward and its western boundary extending westward, guiding typhoon paths northwestward. The ascending branch of the Walker circulation shifted westward and intensified, elevating the latitude of typhoon genesis. Meanwhile, the cooling in the tropical North Atlantic and the positive phase of the Indian Ocean Dipole (IOD) enhanced water vapor convergence through Kelvin and Rossby waves, contributing to anomalies in the WPSH. The combined effects of the WPSH, Walker circulation, and other climate modes during the triple La Niña altered the environmental fields for typhoons (with increased relative humidity and vertical velocity). As a result, typhoon genesis locations shifted northwestward, and the centroid of typhoon tracks moved closer to the Chinese coast.

explanation: 该研究涉及南极振荡（AAO）与哈德莱环流边缘变化的关系，探讨了大气环流模式对区域气候的影响，这与大气环境遥感技术中的大气成分分析和气候变化监测密切相关。
authors: Yuheng Tang;Anmin Duan;Die Hu;Jing-Jia Luo
title: Regional Hadley cell edge variations associated with the Antarctic Oscillation
abstract:
•The AAO shows robust relationships with Hadley circulation edge variations in different sectors across seasons, with the strongest coupling in the Indo-Pacific sector associated with the eddies. •The AAO modulates precipitation via Hadley circulation changes, enhancing the rainfall over Australia in SON and generating a European dipole pattern in DJF. •The Antarctic Oscillation (AAO) exhibits a zonally asymmetric structure that correspond to tropical velocity potential anomalies in Indo-Pacific, East Pacific, and Atlantic-Africa sectors. 
 Previous studies have revealed distinct regional variations of the Hadley cell and zonal asymmetric features in Antarctic Oscillation (AAO), the dominant atmospheric mode of the extratropical Southern Hemisphere. However, the interannual connection between them and the impacts of AAO on the local Hadley circulation edges in both hemispheres still remain unclear. Based on ERA5 reanalysis during 1979–2020, this study demonstrates that the AAO exhibits a zonal asymmetric spatial structure that aligns with the distribution of tropical velocity potential anomalies, and divides the Hadley circulation into Indo-Pacific, East Pacific, and Atlantic-Africa sectors, with the Indo-Pacific sector displaying the strongest edge variability. AAO is out-phase with the variations of the southern hemispheric Hadley circulation edge (SHE) of the Indo-Pacific sector in March–April-May, September–October-November (SON), and December–January-February (DJF), and out-phase with the variations of East Pacific sector's SHE in June–July-August. AAO is in-phase with the variations of the northern hemispheric Hadley circulation edge (NHE) of the Atlantic-Africa sector in DJF. Above processes are reproduced by the linear baroclinic model. AAO primarily influences the SHE via the transient eddies, while its impact on the NHE is jointly modulated by both transient and stationary eddies. Finally, we reveal the AAO's influence on precipitation anomalies via the Hadley circulation: AAO is in-phase with precipitation over Australia in SON, but in DJF a positive AAO forces a dipole pattern of decreased precipitation in southern Europe and Mediterranean and increased precipitation in northern Europe. This study deepens the pivotal role of AAO in regional Hadley circulation dynamics.

explanation: 该研究使用雷达和闪电定位系统分析广州地区雷暴的反射特性，特别是与强上冲气流相关的云地闪电产生机制。这与大气环境遥感技术中的风暴监测、雷电活动和大气动力学分析密切相关，属于大气环境遥感技术的研究范畴。
authors: Fei Wang;Luwen Chen;Wen Yao;Dong Zheng;Ge Zhang
title: Reflectivity characteristics of isolated small-scale storms producing large-peak-current cloud-to-ground lightning in Guangzhou
abstract:
•Strong updrafts (with 40 dBZ echo top ≥12 km) drive large-peak-current CG lightning (LCG) production. •The combination of Top40 and 40 dBZ area at 5 km (Area40_5) effectively differentiates LCG-dominant from non-LCG storms. •LCG activity peaks in Area40_5's growth phase, prior to its max, then declines sharply. •Pre-LCG Top40 (30-min prior) is a strong predictor for initial LCG flash counts in strong-updraft storms. •LCG flashes indicate active updraft periods, reflecting electrification intensity and storm dynamics. 
 This study analyzes 53 storms that occurred in the summer of 2015, using data from the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Lightning Location System (GLLS) and an S-band Doppler radar observation. Among these storms, 34 produced large-peak-current cloud-to-ground (LCG) lightning, 10 produced only small-peak-current CG (SCG) lightning, and 9 produced no detectable CG lightning. The results show that the combination of 40 dBZ echo top height (Top40) and 40 dBZ echo area at 5 km altitude (Area40_5) effectively distinguishes LCG-dominant storms from non-LCG storms.The analysis reveals that updraft intensity fundamentally controls LCG production. Storms exhibiting maximum Top40 ≥ 12 km show evidently higher peak LCG frequencies and greater total LCG counts compared to storms with weaker updrafts. Notably, even storms with maximum Top40 < 12 km can achieve substantial LCG production when these moderately intense updrafts exhibit prolonged duration.A robust correlation emerges between the maximum Top40 values recorded during the 30-min period preceding LCG initiation and subsequent LCG counts in the initial active phase. Throughout storm lifetimes, Top40 variations mirror LCG frequency trends, with Top40 and Area40_5 values during LCG-active periods consistently exceeding those during SCG-only periods. Primary LCG activity predominantly occurs during Area40_5's growth phase prior to peak development, followed by rapid weakening or diminishment after the peak.These findings confirm that LCGs result from active updrafts, which may provide both favorable conditions for vigorous electrification and formation of high-density charge structures. Consequently, frequent LCG activity serves as an indicator of active updraft periods in storms.It should be noted that the thunderstorm cases analyzed in this study were all from a single summer season. Although the fundamental trends and relationships identified are expected to be robust, some specific quantitative values may vary interannually. Furthermore, the analysis primarily focused on localized, small-scale thunderstorms, which represent the most common type during the local summer. Consequently, the conclusions drawn here may not be fully applicable to larger-scale convective systems and should be interpreted with caution in such contexts.

explanation: 该论文与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它涉及使用卫星数据（如火辐射功率）来估算北方森林野火排放，并利用高分辨率地图进行空气质量监测和气候变化适应策略。
authors: Johan A. Eckdahl;Lars Nieradzik;Louise Rütting
title: Reassessing boreal wildfire drivers enables high-resolution mapping of emissions for climate adaptation
abstract: The expansive carbon reservoirs of the boreal region are becoming some of the most rapidly growing sources of greenhouse gasses under a positive feedback between intensifying fire activity and climate change. However, current regional-scale methods lack the spatial precision needed to improve understanding of the drivers of these fluxes to inform strategies aimed at maximizing landscape carbon storage. Here, we develop an alternative and highly constrained procedure for estimating wildfire emissions at both local (10 meters) and regional (1000 kilometers) scales in boreal Fennoscandia. This approach reassessed existing knowledge of heat development within the context of modern geospatial datasets, revealing expanded applications of satellite-derived fire radiative power in classifying distinct smoldering dynamics. The findings additionally emphasized the importance of capturing fine-scale variation in climate-sensitive fuel loading when determining regional fire season impact. Comparisons revealed substantial limitations in existing boreal carbon accounting methods while providing insights into the sensitivity of fire regime characteristics to climate, management, and landscape structure.

explanation: 该论文研究了火星大气中的闪电产生的电磁波，并通过NASA的MAVEN卫星进行了观测。这涉及到了大气环境中的电磁波探测技术，与大气环境遥感技术（如卫星观测和大气成分分析）密切相关。
authors: František Němec;Kateřina Rosická;Ivana Kolmašová;Ondřej Santolík
title: Lightning-generated waves detected at Mars
abstract: Although lightning activity has been confirmed on Jupiter, Saturn, and Neptune through the detection of lightning-generated electromagnetic waves, its occurrence on Venus and Mars remains unclear. Here, we report observations of such a frequency-dispersed whistler detected in the ionosphere of Mars by NASA’s MAVEN spacecraft. We demonstrate the plausibility of wave propagation from the atmosphere to the spacecraft, and we show that the observed dispersion corresponds to theoretical expectations using realistic crustal magnetic field and ionospheric models. Increased attenuation at higher frequencies explains why only the low-frequency part of the whistler is observed. Our observations provide direct evidence of electromagnetic waves from an impulsive source on Mars, suggesting that electric discharges may indeed occur in the Martian atmosphere.

explanation: 该论文研究的是利用非谐振异常点（NR-EPDs）进行噪声抗性传感的技术，涉及微波超材料，这可以应用于大气成分分析和环境监测，因此与大气环境遥感技术相关。
authors: Serena Landers;William Tuxbury;Ilya Vitebskiy;Tsampikos Kottos
title: Noise-resilient exceptional point sensing with immunity to undesired perturbations
abstract: Exceptional point degeneracies (EPDs) are non-Hermitian singularities whereKeigenvalues and their corresponding eigenvectors coalesce. When a small perturbation is induced, the eigenvalue detuning from an EPD follows aKth-root sublinear expansion, which provides a means of enhancing the sensitivity (frequency shift) of resonant-based sensors. On the downside, resonant-based sensors are susceptible to cavity imperfections, local mechanical disturbances (temperature variations, vibrations), and other experimental uncertainties. Here, we overcome this problem by experimentally implementing passive periodic microwave metamaterials with nonresonant EPDs (NR-EPDs) occurring in their Bloch spectrum. We demonstrate a sublinear variation of the reflectance near NR-EPDs to a specific class of (global) perturbations and propose its usage for ultrasensitive sensing that is immune to undesired (local) perturbations. The sensitivity is shielded from technical or fundamental noise that typically degrades the signal-to-noise performance of resonant EPDs.
